scripts.localTest: gulp testSpecs && gulp testVisual --env=local --branch=`git rev-parse --abbrev-ref HEAD`
scripts.travisTest: gulp testSpecs && gulp testVisual --env=travis --branch=`git rev-parse --abbrev-ref HEAD`
scripts.gatherDiffs: rm -rf .tmp/diffs; mkdir -p .tmp/diffs/; for I in `find theSrc/test/snapshots/local/VIS-554 -type d -name __diff_output__`; do cp $I/* .tmp/diffs/ 2> /dev/null; done; true
